name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D Birthday Performance】Risu's Isekai Express ： Special Performance Delivery【#RiSekaiExpress】 [995QkX6r7RA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Instrumental dance section with lighting effects and Risu using a toy gun.

subtitles.original: それでも赤い糸
subtitles.english: Even so, the red thread of fate

subtitles.original: 繋いでいるのでしょう
subtitles.english: ...must be tying us together.

subtitles.original: 底知れぬものだけに 怯えるのではないでしょう
subtitles.english: One shouldn't fear things just because they are bottomless, right?

subtitles.original: 届かぬものばかりが 妬ましくはないでしょう
subtitles.english: It's not as if only the unreachable things are enviable.

subtitles.original: 優しいことばかりが 優しさではないのでしょう
subtitles.english: Gentleness is not just about being kind, is it?

subtitles.original: さりとて赤裸々では こそばゆいのでしょう
subtitles.english: Yet, being completely naked is a bit ticklish, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 跳ねよ跳ねよ 人波を望み
subtitles.english: Leap, leap, longing for the crowd of people.

subtitles.original: 人波に拒まれては
subtitles.english: And being rejected by the crowd...

subtitles.original: 皆そこ目指す 未だ勝手な場所
subtitles.english: Everyone aims for that place, a place that's still selfish.

subtitles.original: 傍若無人であいた頃を
subtitles.english: Back when we were insolent and arrogant.

subtitles.original: 遠吠えとわ Let's go
subtitles.english: What is called a howl? Let's go!

subtitles.original: 髪の長さ揃えて 爪の先を塗り直す
subtitles.english: Trimming my hair and repainting my nails.

subtitles.original: あどけない唇も 色めき立つその目
subtitles.english: My innocent lips and those eyes that light up.

subtitles.original: 語らうこともありましょう 語らぬ人もおりましょう
subtitles.english: There will be times when we talk, and there will be those who don't.

subtitles.original: それゆえ慰めなど もう要られないのでしょう
subtitles.english: That's why comforts are probably no longer needed.

subtitles.original: 跳ねよ跳ねよ 皆共に散って
subtitles.english: Leap, leap, let us all scatter together.

subtitles.original: 既知の数数えて 痛みの数指折る
subtitles.english: Counting the known things, counting the pains on my fingers.

subtitles.original: 一つ余り小指は 愛おしさらばね
subtitles.english: The one left over pinky finger is for love.

subtitles.original: 悔やむこともありましょう 私の所為もありましょう
subtitles.english: There will be regrets, and some will be my fault.

subtitles.original: いつかは赤い糸 断ち切るのでしょう
subtitles.english: One day, the red thread will probably be cut.

subtitles.original: 花びらに囁きを 憐れみから口づけを
subtitles.english: Whispers to the petals, a kiss out of pity.

subtitles.original: 懐かしくて初めて 咲き退けるのでしょう
subtitles.english: It's nostalgic, and for the first time, it will bloom and fall.

subtitles.original: 迷うこともありましょう 誰かの所為じゃないでしょう
subtitles.english: There will be times of doubt, and it won't be anyone's fault.

subtitles.original: 難しいものですね 愛するということは
subtitles.english: It's a difficult thing, isn't it? This thing called loving.

subtitles.original: 君の虜になってしまえばきっと
subtitles.english: If I become captivated by you, I'm sure...

subtitles.original: この夏は充実するのもっと
subtitles.english: ...this summer will be much more fulfilling.

subtitles.original: 噂のドリーミンガール忘れないで
subtitles.english: Don't forget the rumored "Dreamin' Girl".

subtitles.original: summertime
subtitles.english: summertime

subtitles.original: Lyrics: 原田夏樹, 鈴木まりこ Music: 原田夏樹
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Natsuki Harada, Mariko Suzuki Music: Natsuki Harada

subtitles.original: 何年経っても言えない
subtitles.english: Even after years pass, I can't say it.

subtitles.original: 後悔したって構わない
subtitles.english: I don't mind even if I regret it.

subtitles.original: でも言葉はここまで出てるの
subtitles.english: But the words are right on the tip of my tongue.

subtitles.original: ねえ サマータイム
subtitles.english: Hey, summertime.

subtitles.original: 海岸通りを歩きたい
subtitles.english: I want to walk along the coastal road.

subtitles.original: ドライブだってしてみたい
subtitles.english: I even want to go for a drive.

subtitles.original: ただ視線を合わせてほしいの
subtitles.english: I just want our eyes to meet.

subtitles.original: ねえ サマータイム
subtitles.english: Hey, summertime.

subtitles.original: 夜明けまで海辺走って
subtitles.english: Running along the beach until dawn.

subtitles.original: 潮騒に包まれたいね
subtitles.english: I want to be enveloped by the sound of the tide.

subtitles.original: 彼女の仕草が
subtitles.english: Her gestures...

subtitles.original: 甘いね
subtitles.english: ...are sweet, aren't they?

subtitles.original: 君の虜になってしまえばきっと
subtitles.english: If I become captivated by you, I'm sure...

subtitles.original: この夏は充実するのもっと
subtitles.english: ...this summer will be much more fulfilling.

subtitles.original: 噂のドリーミンガール忘れないで
subtitles.english: Don't forget the rumored "Dreamin' Girl".

subtitles.original: でも気持ちを伝えてしまえばいつか
subtitles.english: But if I tell you how I feel, then one day...

subtitles.original: この夢は覚めてしまうだろうな
subtitles.english: ...this dream will probably come to an end.

subtitles.original: 青い影が揺れる街角
subtitles.english: At the street corner where blue shadows sway.

subtitles.original: 占いなんて信じない
subtitles.english: I don't believe in things like fortune-telling.

subtitles.original: 運命なんてあるわけない
subtitles.english: There's no way things like "fate" exist.

subtitles.original: ただ本当のことを知りたいの
subtitles.english: I just want to know the truth.

subtitles.original: ねえ サマータイム
subtitles.english: Hey, summertime.

subtitles.original: 近づく距離にも気づかない
subtitles.english: Not even noticing the distance getting shorter.

subtitles.original: 胸の高鳴り誤魔化せない
subtitles.english: I can't hide the throbbing of my heart.

subtitles.original: でも昔と変わらず鈍いの
subtitles.english: But you're just as slow as you used to be.

subtitles.original: ねえ サマータイム
subtitles.english: Hey, summertime.

subtitles.original: 思い出は色褪せたって
subtitles.english: Even if memories have faded...

subtitles.original: 惚れた腫れたの中がいいね
subtitles.english: ...being head over heels is good, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 彼女の笑顔が
subtitles.english: Her smile...

subtitles.original: 憎いね
subtitles.english: ...is frustrating, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 君の虜に...
subtitles.english: Captivated by you...
